price: Wọ́n fẹ́ẹ̀ kó ìyọnu bá ọ nípa n̄ǹkan tí A mú wá fún ọ ní ìmísí nítorí kí o lè hun n̄ǹkan mìíràn nípa Wa. Nígbà náà, wọn ìbá mú ọ ní ọ̀rẹ́ àyò.
arabic: وَإِن كَادُواْ لَيَفۡتِنُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ لِتَفۡتَرِيَ عَلَيۡنَا غَيۡرَهُۥۖ وَإِذٗا لَّٱتَّخَذُوكَ خَلِيلٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kādū layaftinūnaka ʿani alladhī awḥaynā ilayka litaftariya ʿalaynā ghayrahu wa-idhan la-ittakhadhūka khalīlan
